name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Factr: Fun facts in your new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Factr, get interesting new facts on your Chrome new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Factr is a simple new-tab extension for Google Chrome. With Factr, every time you open a new tab, you will see a fun and interesting fact üòç
